label: durationUnitDurationMeasure
comment: The measure of a length of time duration specified for these trade payment terms, such as 12 hours, 15 days, 2 weeks, 3 months, 5 years.

rangeIncludes.comment: A numeric value determined by measuring a duration of time.

domainIncludes.comment: Terms and conditions by which payment has been or will be made for trade purposes.
